resources.string: To finish the tutorial, swipe up with 3 fingers, and find the finish tutorial option
The options menu is open. You can now use regular TalkBack gestures to navigate. Swipe right to see more options.
With the braille keyboard, you can tap your screen to enter 6-dot braille.\n\nYou’re using Unified English Braille. To switch your typing language, go to TalkBack settings.
Your %1$s should be on dot 1. Now, tap dot 1 to type the letter “A”.
